biotools.summary: BioMercator is a software that provides a complete set of algorithms and visualization tool covering all steps required to perform QTL meta-analysis, graphical representation of large datasets. User may import sequence and genome annotations datasets within the software in order to display functional annotation related to QTL and meta-QTL.
